title: Meet the Nigerian designer beloved by Madonna and Lupita Nyong’o
content:
Busayo Olupona combines traditional Nigerian prints with Western silhouettes. Over the last two years, her brand has exploded as consumers are eager to celebrate African design.

Busayo Olupona didnâ€™t always love the vibrant clothes of her native Nigeria. When she moved from Lagos to California, she showed up for her first day of middle school in a colorful, patterned Nigerian dress only to be ridiculed mercilessly by her white classmates.
